MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:59am. Our emergency response team are on their way to the Highlea Circle substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:23pm on Thursday, 08 April 2021
